name: generate_radar_chart
description: Generate a radar chart to display multidimensional data (four dimensions or more), such as, evaluate Huawei and Apple phones in terms of five dimensions: ease of use, functionality, camera, benchmark scores, and battery life.

value.description: Value of the dimension, such as 70.

group.description: Group name for multiple series, used for comparing different entities

data.description: Data for radar chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70 }, { name: 'Performance', value: 85 }] or [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, group: 'iPhone' }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.
